Content: A group of United National Party backbenchers are getting ready to make a written request today (May 02) to Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe requesting a meeting with him. They want to further discuss the party restructuring process. The UNP backbenchers had arrived at this decision after having a discussion at the Parliamentary Complex yesterday. A letter signed by 16 UNP MP’s would be handed over to the PM’s Office today. It was reported that another discussion was held yesterday between UNP MPs and Ministers at Temple Trees. The future course of action within the party had been discussed there. However, several backbenchers had not participated in this meeting.
